thread.title: Commercial Metals Bolsters Holdings of a Construction Steel

author: Bob Tita
title: Commercial Metals Bolsters Holdings of a Construction Steel

organizations.name: commercial metals bolsters holdings of a construction steel texas-based commercial metals co.

text:
Texas-based Commercial Metals Co. said it plans to acquire assets from a Brazilian rival that would double its share of a key construction material.
The company plans to pay $600 million in cash for the U.S. steel-reinforcing-bar assets of Brazil’s Gerdau SA, adding four mills and 33 fabrication plants.
Gerdau’s exit from the U.S. rebar market...
